component.name: fetchEvent
component.description: This method helps to fetch all of the events that are accessible by the user.

component.name: retrieveEvent
component.description: This method helps to fetch all of the events that are accessible by the user.

component.name: createEvent
component.description: This method helps to create a new event that is accessible by the user.

component.name: fetchEventById
component.description: This method helps to retrieve a specific event using it unique identifier..

component.name: updateEventById
component.description: This method helps to Update a existing event with new properties, these properties will be saved to the database and the new event will be returned.

component.name: deleteEventById
component.description: This method helps to delete a existing event .
